verses.roman:
prabhu jānena--dina pāṅca-sāta se rahiba
sannyāsīra saṅge bhikṣā kāhāṅ nā kariba

synonyms: prabhu—Śrī Caitanya Mahāprabhu; jānena—knows; dina—days; pāṅca-sāta—five days or at the most a week; se—that; rahiba—I shall stay; sannyāsīra saṅge—with other Māyāvādī sannyāsīs; bhikṣā—lunch; kāhāṅ—at any time; nā kariba—I shall not take.
translation: It was known to Śrī Caitanya Mahāprabhu that He would remain there only five or seven days. He would not accept any invitation that involved Māyāvādī sannyāsīs.
